data.message: Facebook I have a problem. Me Mom  “sent me” something on my messenger. Then I got texted that she was hacked and not to open And if I do I would get hacked fully. Can you help with that.

replies.message: Also it was a link but I was able to delete it. I did screenshot it and saved it but did not open the link.
Hi there, Nicolas. If you think your account has been taken over by someone else, you can secure it here: http://bit.ly/2zN3Pjy. -Mollie
No my account did not get taken over it’s just a possible hack. Because some one who did so it got hacked. I just wanna tell you so FB will do something about it.
